This book is aimed at those adult learners with the basic information and skills in Finnish, but who have not yet achieved fluency. The book includes plenty of dialogues, stories and different kinds of texts, and exercises related to them. It also includes a glossary and model answers. When students are familiar with the content of this textbook, they will be on level 3 of the general language examinations. This is the level which is necessary in order to obtain Finnish citizenship.

The book comes with a CD recording of the dialogues in the chapters and the listening comprehension exercises.
